themes.name: Birthday
themes.description: Celebrating special occasions and joyful milestones
conversation_prompts: How did you celebrate birthdays when you were young?
What was your favorite kind of birthday cake?
Do you remember a special birthday gift?
Tell me about a birthday party you'll never forget

themes.name: Family
conversation_prompts: Tell me about your family

What did your family do together on weekends?

Do you remember learning to play an instrument?

themes.name: Food
conversation_prompts: What was your favorite food growing up?

themes.name: Travel

themes.name: Seasons
